1.content:
Let's get started then.

And remember the pony are anthro.
1.title: Let's start

info.brief_description: What happened if   anthro ponies and humans live in the same world?
info.description:
Here's a list of something that I allow and not allow.


Allow list:

Sex ( age and size.)
Humans turn into pony and ponies turn into human
Lesbians
Pony growth (But they have to be about 50 feet or under)
Pony gain weight
Unbirth
Human pov
Foot fetish
And having fun

Not Allow list:

Bad words
Death
Use someone as a toilet
Gay
Farting on people
Throw people in trash or toilet
Fat joke
You asking me stupid questions

Fellow the list and no one is going to the moon.
info.pretty_title: MLP It's a anthro pony would after all
